title: Pixman installation fails on macOS
body:
I am unable to build `pixman`.

### Expected Result

A successful installation.

### Actual Result
```
5 errors found in build log:
     594      CC       oob-test.o
     595      CC       infinite-loop.o
     596      CC       trap-crasher.o
     597      CC       fence-image-self-test.o
     598      CC       region-translate-test.o
     599      CC       fetch-test.o
  >> 600    utils-prng.c:207:27: error: use of unknown builtin '__builtin_shuffle' [-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
     601                randdata.vb = __builtin_shuffle (randdata.vb, bswap_shufflemask);
     602                              ^
  >> 603    utils-prng.c:207:25: error: assigning to 'uint8x16' (vector of 16 'uint8_t' values) from incompatible type 'int'
     604                randdata.vb = __builtin_shuffle (randdata.vb, bswap_shufflemask);
     605                            ^ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     606    2 errors generated.
  >> 607    make[2]: *** [utils-prng.lo] Error 1
     608    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     609      CC       a1-trap-test.o
  >> 610    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
  >> 611    make: *** [all] Error 2
```
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install pixman
```

### Information on your system

- macOS 10.13.5
- Clang 9.0.0
